text: Year 31 BC was either a common year starting on Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday or a leap year starting on Tuesday or Wednesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Antonius and Octavianus. ==Events== * Gaius Julius Caesar Octavian becomes Roman Consul for the third time. His partner is Marcus Valerius Messalla Corvinus, replacing Mark Antony. * Octavian establishes a bridgehead at the Gulf of Ambracia * Marcus Vipsanius Agrippa sailed with 300 war galleys to the western Peloponnese. He occupied the Gulf of Corinth to cut off Antony's line of communication. * Antony sets up camp at the promontory of Actium. * Agrippa stormed Leucas. He took the garrison at Patrae. * The Egyptian fleet retreats to Taenarus. * Octavian takes court at Samos * In the Judean Desert Herod the Great completes the fortress Masada. * The Hellenistic period in art ends (or AD 14 by some scholars)
title: 31 BC
